welcome_message_title: Welcome to Banco Filipino International Village
welcome_message_body: Welcome to Banco Filipino International Village! Get ready to experience the charm of this beautiful city known for its stunning beaches, vibrant culture, and delicious cuisine. We hope you have a fantastic time exploring and enjoying all that this city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it primarily serves international flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at the airport, serving both domestic and international flights for Cebu Pacific, PAL Express, and several other airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves all domestic flights for airlines such as Cebu Pacific, AirAsia, and Skyjet.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow and unreliable at times.
